titleStmt.title: A pastime for parents: or A recreation to passe away the time; contayning the most principall grounds of Christian religion. By Arthur Dent preacher of the word of God at South-Shoobery in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. E[ast] for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 6623a on UMI microfilm reel 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reels 418 and 1659 (both British Library copy).
